name: Girl With A Lazer Shotgun
storyline: Defeat Gala, your evil ex-girlfriend, and you may just make it off the planet alive.
summary:
This direct-to-vhs retro shooter comes with 10 action packed levels, where you'll have to use every shell from your lazer shotgun carefully.  
 
You've got 8 shells per box, and as you progress through each stage the enemy types become more varied - producing dangerous combinations that will require quick tactics and reflexes.
